enWisdom: Glory is the attainment of [the power to exact] revenge

Wisdom: تَعَزَّ عَنِ الشَّيْ‏ءِ إِذَا مُنِعْتَهُ بِقِلَّةِ مَا يَصْحَبُكَ إِذَا أُوتِيتَهُ
enWisdom: When you are deprived of something in this world, take comfort in the fact that it would have been with you [only] for a little while

Wisdom: سَاعَةُ ذُلٍّ لَا تَفِي بِعِزِّ الدَّهْرِ
enWisdom: An hour of humiliation is not compensated for by a lifetime of honour
One who seeks honour through [anyone] other than Allah is abased

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَزَّ بِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ أَهْلَكَهُ الْعِزُّ
enWisdom: One who seeks glory through [anyone] other than Allah is destroyed by [the] glory
One who seeks honour through truth will be honoured by truth

Wisdom: مَنْ يَطْلُبِ الْعِزَّ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ يَذِلَّ
enWisdom: One who seeks glory without having any right to it gets humiliated

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَزَّ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ أَذَلَّهُ اللَّهُ بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: One who seeks glory through [anything] other than truth, Allah humiliates him with [the] truth
